Audio Transcription: The process of converting spoken language into written text.
Stack Abstract Datatype: A simple data structure that contains zero or more items. Items are added or removed from the top of the stack.
Item: An object or data that can be added or removed from the stack.
Top of the Stack: The location where items are added or removed in a stack datatype.
Pushing to the Stack: The process of adding an item to the top of the stack.
Popping from the Stack: The process of removing an item from the top of the stack.
Last In First Out: A method of processing data where the most recently added item is the first one to be removed, commonly used in stack datatype.
